    • Constructor Detail

      • AppointmentBlock

        public AppointmentBlock(Appointment appointment,
                DayPanel dp)

    • Method Detail

      • setText

        public void setText()
        Sets the text of the appointment block. If the appointment is filled, it lists the time slot and patient. Otherwise, just the patient.

      • setPatient

        public void setPatient(Patient pat)
        Sets the appointment
        Parameters:
        pat - the patient that is filling this appointment

      • focusGained

        public void focusGained(java.awt.event.FocusEvent arg0)
        When focus is gained, enable buttons on the "DayPanel" and change the background color of the appointment block. Also, add a mouse listener to begin looking for double-click events.
        Specified by:
        focusGained in interface java.awt.event.FocusListener

      • focusLost

        public void focusLost(java.awt.event.FocusEvent arg0)
        When focus is lost, disable buttons on the "DayPanel" and change the background color of the block back to normal. Remove double-click mouse listener.
        Specified by:
        focusLost in interface java.awt.event.FocusListener

      • clearAppt

        public void clearAppt()

      • getAppointment

        public Appointment getAppointment()

      • setNote

        public void setNote(java.lang.String note)
